meanings.definition: Cause (an organization or group) to break up or stop functioning.
meanings.sent1: The principal decided to disbands the school club due to lack of members.
meanings.sent2: The band disbands after their final concert.
meanings.sent3: The magician's assistant disbands the deck of cards, making them disappear.
meanings.sent4: The storm disbands the clouds, revealing a clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher disbands the students into groups for a class project.

meanings.definition: Break up or stop functioning as an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The team disbands after losing their final game of the season.
meanings.sent2: The committee disbands after completing their task.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces seem to disbands whenever I try to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The music disbands into a cacophony of sounds at the end of the symphony.
meanings.sent5: The snowman disbands as the sun melts it away.
